data.text:
The Two Hundredth Episode

Frasier savours his 2,000th radio broadcast, until he learns he's missing one tape from all his programmes, and has to track down an obsessed fan to complete his collection.

The Gates Excitation

The guys do everything in their power to meet Bill Gates when his firm has dealings with the pharmaceutical company Penny works for.

September 21, 2017 - Bill Gates

Tonight's guest is the co-founder of Microsoft and co-chair of the `Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation', Bill Gates.
